Hazard.Name: Pinch Detection Malfunction
Hazard.Description: If the system fails to detect an obstacle in the window path (i.e. a human apengage) it will can cause physical harm to the user.

Hazard.Name: Window Did Not Stop on Fully Open or Close
Hazard.Description: The motor should stop when the window is fully open or fully closed. This could damage the motor.

Hazard.Name: Window Does Not Move on Request

BasicEvent.Name: WireBroken
BasicEvent.Description: There is a loose wire connection or the wire has been damaged and no long sends commands

BasicEvent.Name: ContactsBroken
BasicEvent.Description: The contacts have been no damaged and no long open and close the circuit as expected.

BasicEvent.Name: InternalFailure
BasicEvent.Description: A failure has occured inside the switch to provide an unexpected value (no necessarily no value)

OutputDeviation.Name: Omission-neutral
OutputDeviation.Description: No signal on the neutral port

OutputDeviation.Name: Omission-up
OutputDeviation.Description: No signal on the up port

OutputDeviation.Name: Omission-down
OutputDeviation.Description: No signal on the down port

BasicEvent.Name: SoftwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The control software failed to detect the end stop based on the current

BasicEvent.Description: The hardware has produced a failure

BasicEvent.Name: SoftwareFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The control software failed to detect the object

BasicEvent.Description: The hardware has produced a failure in the system

BasicEvent.Name: CurrentSensorFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The current sensor in the actuator has failed and is no longer providing a value.

BasicEvent.Name: BatteryFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The battery is no longer providing current to the motor.

BasicEvent.Name: CurrentSensorDamaged
BasicEvent.Description: The current sensor has been damage or is not calibrated properly and is providing an incorrect current value.

BasicEvent.Name: MotorFailure
BasicEvent.Description: The motor is no longer providing current for the sensor to read and is not providing any torque.
